text: Ivan Hudec (10 July 1947 – 7 February 2022) was a Slovak writer and politician. He was a member of the People's Party – Movement for a Democratic Slovakia. He was Minister of Culture from 1994 to 1998. Hudec was born in Nitra, Czechoslovakia. Hudec died in Bratislava, Slovakia on 7 February 2022, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Slovak politicians Category:European writers
title: Ivan Hudec
